comparison.description: Determines how the amount of the item in the item stack should be compared to the specified value.
comparison.markdownDescription: Determines how the amount of the item in the item stack should be compared to the specified value.

compare_to.description: The value at which the amount of the item in the item stack will be compared to.
compare_to.markdownDescription: The value at which the amount of the item in the item stack will be compared to.

type.description:
## Amount

---


[Item Condition Type](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/item_condition_types/amount)

Checks the amount of the item in the item stack.

Type ID: `origins:amount`

---

### Examples

```json
"item_condition": {
    "type": "origins:amount",
    "comparison": ">=",
    "compare_to": 10
}
```

This example will check if there are 10 or more items in the item stack.
